long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Custom Noise Generator - White Noise for Focus and Relaxation

Custom Noise Generator is a Chrome extension that provides a variety of white noises to help you focus while working and relax during breaks.

Key Features and Benefits:

üìç Diverse Noise Selection:
    * Offers various noise types including white, pink, brown, and more.
    * Create personalized sounds with custom noise settings.

üìç Intuitive Controls:
    * Simple play/pause button.
    * Easy volume control with a slider.
    * Continuous playback even in the browser background.

üìç Custom Noise Settings:
    * Fine-tune frequency, resonance, modulation, and filter cutoff.
    * Save and load user settings as presets.

üìç User-Friendly Design:
    * Clean and intuitive interface.
    * All settings are automatically saved, maintaining the same environment for the next session.

Technical Features:

* Reliable settings storage using the Chrome Storage API.
* High-quality noise generation using the Web Audio API.
* Background playback support using the Offscreen API.
* Responsive user interface built with jQuery.

FAQ:

Q: Can it play in the background?
A: Yes, the noise continues to play even when using other tabs or minimizing the browser.

Q: Are the settings saved?
A: Yes, all settings, including noise type, volume, and custom settings, are automatically saved.

Q: How many types of noise are available?
A: We offer 5 basic presets (white, pink, brown, violet, and grey), along with options for users to create their own custom noises.

Planned Future Updates:

* Timer functionality
* Additional ambient sounds
* Dark mode support
* Keyboard shortcut support
* Visual animation effects

Contact:

For any inquiries or feedback, please contact skykum2004@gmail.com.
